channel.title: Angel (NK Probably)
channel.description:
Lore Summary - A maddened angel obsessed who wishes to learn what makes humans wicked, and then to purify the corrupt
**Passive - Divine Intervention** - Immune to death and occupation at night
**Passive - Holy Knowledge** - You will know exactly which factions/class types you have yet to identify
**Day Ability 1 - Act Casual** - You will appear as a goodboi to investigators tonight - 3 uses
**Night Ability 1 - A Glimpse of the Soul** - You will learn your target's exact class, if you have then investigated at least 1 member of each faction that is still in the game and 1 class of each type that is still in the game, you gain 1 use of **Purge the Wicked**, a player will be notified that you looked into their soul - Infinite Uses
**Night Ability 2 - Purge the Wicked** - Kill all other players, deaths from this method cannot be prevented in any way - 0 Uses
_Goal - Be the only player alive at the end of the game_
Notes: Yo help me balance this

item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Jazz:

Night Ability 1 - A Glimpse of the Soul - You will learn your target’s exact class, if you have then investigated at least 1 member of each faction and 1 class of each type, you gain 1 use of Purge the Wicked. a player will be notified that you looked into their soul - Infinite Uses

If all the Support classes die N1, will you never be able to use this ability since you didn’t get a chance to investigate them?

Jazz:

at least 1 member of each faction and 1 class of each type

This seems INCREDIBLY difficult to do. The very earliest you could Purge the Wicked would be Night 6 if you were incredibly lucky (probably around 0.5% chance of this happening)

Killer (1) + Support (2) + Invest (3) + Special (4) + Offensive (5) and then you have to wait until Night 6 to activate it. Act Casual helps you live longer I guess, but your occupation immunity is a liability, too.
